summary: Follows the story of 4 college football players signed by the sports agency IMG, as they bring them to a training facility in Florida and both physically and mentally prepare them for the NFL draft.
cast: Bruce Allen|Tom Condon|Chuck Cook|Blair Dalton|Jon Gruden|Derek Hagan|Steve Hale|Clint Ingram|Ruby Ingram|Michael Johnson|Mel Kiper|Ted Meekma|Trevor Moawad|Dontrell Moore|Scott Piri|Andy Reid|Theresa Reyes|Marty Schottenheimer|Dick Selcer|Steve Shenbaum|Chris Singletary|Rob Stone|Lionel Taylor|Jack Tiernan|Travis Wilson|Wendy Wilson
title: Two Days in April
